column1: Integrative Counselling and Psychotherapy (MSc incorporating PGCert/PGDip)
column3: College of Health, Psychology and Social Care
column5: This course is accredited by the British Association for Counselling and Psychotherapy (BACP), so you can be sure it’s relevant and recognised within the psychotherapeutic and health care profession.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 2 years full time, 3 years part time
